useOldNoAgents.description: Use the old data about number of agents

thresDistance.description: Threshold distance for agv to stop when colliding with a person

stopAtHallway.description: Percentage of people stopping at the hallway

p1.description: Percentage of agents (No disability, without overtaking behavior)

p2.description: Percentage of agents (No disability, with overtaking behavior)

srcCodeTestMode.description: If the way is an intersection (T-Junction, 0/1/2 (3) represents the starting point from left, bottom, right (top). If the way is hallway, 0/2 represents the starting point from left, right)

destCodeTestMode.description: 0/1/2 represents the direction of left turn, go straight, turn right of AGV (Only valid for intersections, T-Junction)
